basics.name: The Server side of me
basics.label: Shaping my worklife with meanings... and code
basics.summary: I started my professionnal software engineering career in 2006. I worked, the first 9 years as system integrator and software engineer on enterprise grade applications for 3 IT contractors : [Sopra-Steria](https://www.sopra-steria.com), [Accenture Technology Solutions](https://www.sopra-steria.com) and [Devoteam Digital Factory](https://www.sopra-steria.com). I worked with the following server and client side technologies: Java EE, PHP, Database Management System, JavaScript, HTML, CSS. I worked on connectors for ERP's Integration Project like Oracle Application (Incentive Compensation) for Industries including retail banking, telecommunications and energy.

work.summary:
Resident in Square Innovation Lab (http://www.le-square.paris/partenaires-du-square/).
I designed, implemented the system with the following tools and methodology :
highlights: Strategyzer Business Model Canvas and Value Proposition Canva (https://strategyzer.com/books/value-proposition-design) to extract features and communicates strategy and business model
C4 Models (https://c4model.com/) to communicate the system design
Behavior Driven Developpement and Domain Driven Developpement as conception pattern
Hexagonal Architecture with REST principle as system implementation pattern
Test Driven Design more Integration Testing to validate the behavior first

I used cloud solution with devops operabillity in mind to quickly dev, test and deploy: Github as code repository, Heroku as staging and production platform,  with mLab as MongoDB database provider, Auth0 as Authentification provider
Java as server side technology for resilience, ease of use for Domain Design (It's the one i know best. I am not an 'All in Java type of person' :-) )
I used Apache Maven, Spring Boot, Spring Framework as server side framework to cleanly design the domain as independant modules
ReactJS with React-dom and React-native to address browser and mobile target while keeping the model code base in Javascript the ES6 way

work.company: Devoteam D2F - Accenture Technology Solutions - Sopra Group
highlights: _Sopra Group (4 years) worked for Bouyges Telecom, EDF and more as System Integrator, System Analyst, Developper, customer service level 1
Accenture Technology Solutions (4 years) worked for Societe General Retail Banking, Credit du Nord, La Banque Postale as Developper, System Design and Architecture
Devoteam Digital Factory (6 months) worked for BNP Cardiff as Developper, System Design and Architecture

skills.name: I read the F&%$#in' Doc before I search on Google
System Design
keywords: Architecture Pattern (Layered N-tiers, Event Driven, Microservices)

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
